body.name: Yoobure Corner Shelf, 5-Tier Corner Bookshelf with Metal Frame, Ladder Corner Shelves Display Shelf for Bedroom Living Room, Tall Corner Bookcase Corner Plant Stand, Wood Small Corner Shelf Stand Home
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: 🔥 Always by Your Side. Overall dimensions: 12.3"L x 12.3"W x 67.5"H 🔥

👍【Versatile Corner Stand】The corner bookshelves feature varying depths for each tier, all at 13" height, making them suitable for books, plants, and more. It's a great addition as a bookshelf, display shelf, or plant shelf in any corner of your living room, bedroom, office, balcony, and beyond. This little wonder will make your life easier and give your place a serious style boost.

💪【Sturdy and Stable】Our rustic corner book shelf boasts a sturdy steel frame and premium wood for durability. We've also upgraded it with an extra bottom support foot, an anti-tip kit and adjustable foot pads for maximum stability. A reliable and stylish addition to your space. (The bottom storage shelf holds up to 30 lbs, others up to 22 lbs )

🔧【Effortless Assembly】Not a DIY expert? No worries! We've got you covered with a clear assembly manual, all the necessary tools and labeled parts, to make assembling this black corner shelf a breeze! Moreover, you can find an assembly video on the page for added guidance. Just follow the step-by-step instructions, and you can finish on your own.

🏘【Stylish Space-Saving Shelf】No wall space is wasted with this tall corner shelf! Our ladder corner shelving features a 90° right angle in the rear, fitting snugly against the wall and maximizing limited space. Plus, the round edge design and the combination of elegant wood and black steel tubing give it a chic, vintage look that complements any decor style.

✅【Free-warranty With Great Service】Enjoy peace of mind with our 1-YEAR WARRANTY! If you have any issues with the quality or assembly of the industrial corner shelving unit, please don’t hesitate to contact us, our professional customer service team will get back to you within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yoobure Corner Shelf Looking for a home decor piece that adorns and reflects your unique taste? Look no further – introducing our Multi-Functional Corner Shelf, meticulously crafted to fit seamlessly in various settings. We offer shelves in 2 distinct heights to meet your needs ( 4-tier: 12.3"L x 12.3"W x 53.7"H; 5-tier: 12.3"L x 12.3"W x 67.5"H). Whether you choose the 4-tier or 5-tier option, it will provide you with extra space to unleash your creativity in decoration and storage.

Smooth Round Edge The rounded design eliminates sharp edges and corners, providing peace of mind during use. Extra Support Foot We've enhanced it by adding an additional bottom support foot to ensure maximum stability. Adjustable Foot Pads The adjustable foot pads ensure stability on uneven floors and work well in any position. Anti-tip Kit The anti-tip kit secures the unit is firmly secured to the wall, preventing falls.
Previous page Next page 1 Living Room 2 Home Office 3 Dining Room

How stable is this corner shelf unit? This corner ladder shelf is made with premium materials and equipped with an anti-tip kit. We've also upgraded it with an additional bottom support foot and included adjustable foot pads, all of which significantly ensure and enhance stability. Can this shelf only be used as a corner display shelf? No, it can not only be used as a display rack but also as a tall corner bookshelf, kitchen corner storage shelf, corner plant shelf, and more. It is suitable for various settings such as the living room, balcony, and more. Can I install this wood corner shelf by myself? Yes, please follow the instructions. But note, after assembling all metal brackets, lay the unit on its side and install all shelves: Connect them with the left (or right) and middle metal bars, then secure the shelves on the other side with screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great furniture addition to my loft!!
reviews.reviewText: This corner shelf piece is great! From a room design perspective, it's a perfect addition for a corner. The shelves have enough room for you to put things on for looking pretty (I have battery operated candles on mine). Installation was VERY easy and took like 15 minutes. It's perfect and another thing I might add to the highest shelf is a plant that flows down. Great purchase! Great price and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and really nice looking
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is throughly impressed. It is easy to assemble with clear instructions and no special tools required. Once set up, it’s firm and stable. And the design really fit into my room. I love its functionality and aesthetic appeal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saving space & good quality
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the 4-Tier Corner Shelf because the one I had is not stable enough. I like the design. It’s a versatile and thoughtful Design. Whether I'm showcasing books, plants, or decorative items, it effortlessly blends into my living room, providing both practicality and aesthetic appeal. The steel frame and wood used in its construction give this corner shelf a durable and stylish edge. The added bottom support foot, anti-tip kit, and adjustable foot pads ensure stability. The 90° right angle design at the rear is a smart space-saving solution, snugly fitting against the wall. I should buy the 5-tier. It provides even more versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shelf for flowers
reviews.reviewText: This 4-Tier Corner Bookshelf with a Metal Frame is very beautiful for organizing my flowers. The materials are light but firm. Very easy to assemble just following install instructions. There are labels of numbers on each part which are very helpful. Likes it very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Good quality for the price. Only issue is one hole On bottom not drilled large enough for adjustable foot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect corner shelf / accent shelf
reviews.reviewText: Perfect piece for the corner of my living room- it has the option of 4 or 5 tiers and several options for color. This is actually our second one purchased for our home as we were so happy with the first we had to have another. It is sturdy and the quality is top notch for the price paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Manufacturer did not provide right materials
reviews.reviewText: Nothing is worse than looking forward to a package and finding that in one case one part required for assembly was missing and in their place was too many of another. One part was also mislabeled. I am assuming if this company makes a mistake like this it will make more of the same mistake for other customers. I will avoid making purchases that come from YOOBURE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and price!
